name: Need Help With Notion?
description: As an experienced Notion creator with a growing digital presence online, Notion Workflow, or Ray, can help you understand Notion better.Whether you're creating your own template, need a custom one, or simply curious to see if you can create something to accommodate an idea of yours, I'm all ears. I am a thought partner first. I'm a deep listener who will try to understand your context, idea, and/or problem to help you identify potential alternatives to take actionable steps. Why You Should Trust
features: I use Notion everyday and keep up with all of their most recent updates and features; I can show you in real-time how to create, optimize, and iterate anything on Notion. I walk the talk.; I understand the complexities that go into a robust dashboard/template from the 15 original Notion templates I've created from scratch; My free and premium templates have been downloaded over 1500 times across 70+ countries; I've successfully monetized some of my templates across four different marketplaces; My digital presence online has lead to paid custom template Notion work with individual clients
